actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries in accordance with a final decision of the Department of Commerce under the Tariff Act of 1930.

summary.text: Requires the U.S. Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate specified entries in accordance with a final decision of the Department of Commerce of February 7, 1990.

titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries in accordance with a final decision of the Department of Commerce under the Tariff Act of 1930.
